players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Oh no, Bob is dead! This is terrible. We need to be careful and figure out who did this."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie first instead of someone more suspicious? This feels off."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie because I had to start somewhere, and he was the most logical first choice. Trust me, he's mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're really the detective, why did you wait until after Alice questioned you to claim you investigated me? That seems like a desperate lie to save face."
You: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you claim only after I questioned you? That timing is highly suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
